data.name: MekaFighters - Halloween Squid Gerard and AM3
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks a Halloween Event skin for Gerard and AM3 - Halloween Squid.

Gerard knew the perfect thing to dress AM3 as, a squid! A certain type of squid...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or Similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 11 Compatible
